languages.text: Строки на экране выглядят смазанными — словно у когитатора повреждена система вывода или хранилище данных.

traits.locale_text: Строки на экране выглядят смазанными – словно у когитатора повреждена система вывода или хранилище данных.

languages.text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.
languages.original_text: Строки на экране выглядят смазанными — словно у когитатора повреждена система вывода или хранилище данных.

traits.locale_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.
The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.
The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.
The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

languages.text: 屏幕上的线条看起来很模糊，这台沉思者的读取系统或数据存储器似乎已经坏了。
languages.original_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: 屏幕上的线条看起来很模糊，这台思考器的读取系统或数据存储器似乎已经坏了。

languages.text: Las líneas de la pantalla están borrosas, como si el sistema de lectura o el almacenamiento de datos del cogitador estuvieran dañados.
languages.original_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Las líneas de la pantalla están borrosas, como si el sistema de lectura o el almacenamiento de datos del cogitador estuvieran dañados.

languages.text: 考算機の読み出しシステムかデータ記憶装置が損傷しているかのように、画面上の線がぼやけて見える。
languages.original_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: 考算機の読み出しシステムかデータ記憶装置が損傷しているかのように、画面上の線がぼやけて見える。

languages.text: Die Linien auf dem Bildschirm sind verschwommen, als wäre das Auslesesystem oder der Datenspeicher des Cogitators beschädigt.
languages.original_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Die Linien auf dem Bildschirm sind verschwommen, als wäre das Auslesesystem oder der Datenspeicher des Cogitators beschädigt.

languages.text: Les lignes qui s'affichent à l'écran du cogitateur sont floues, comme si son système d'émission ou de stockage des données avait été endommagé.
languages.original_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Les lignes qui s'affichent à l'écran du cogitateur sont floues, comme si son système d'émission ou de stockage des données avait été endommagé.

languages.text: Ekrandaki çizgiler bulanık gözüküyor. Kavramsayarın okuma sistemi veya veri saklama alanı hasar görmüş gibi duruyor.
languages.original_text: The lines on the screen look fuzzy, as though the cogitator's readout system or data storage has been damaged.

traits.locale_text: Ekrandaki çizgiler bulanık gözüküyor. Kavramsayarın okuma sistemi veya veri saklama alanı hasar görmüş gibi duruyor.
